pre_caption: This video is a static, wide-angle scenery shot of Paris at night. The brightly illuminated Eiffel Tower is the central focus, standing out against the dark sky. The sprawling city below is a vast expanse of twinkling lights, but there is no camera movement or significant motion within the scene.
